name: Blasted
description:
Your goal: make it to the end of each level without crashing, blowing up, getting crushed, smashed, speared, okay you get the idea!

Controls: the player moves vertically with the mouse.

There are five levels, each of which introduces new game mechanics. Comment below if you beat all five of them!

I'm 15 and I love to code. My younger brother helps out too, by feeding me with ideas. This was quite a challenge, building a complete game in the time frame we were given, but it was lots of fun!
